# mystyle_sns_bot - GitHub Copilot Instructions

## Project

mystyleKPOP SNS automation bot. Posts AI fashion K-POP magazine content to X(Twitter) and Instagram.
Node.js ES Modules project (`"type": "module"` in package.json).

## Code Style

- Pure JavaScript with ES Module syntax (`import`/`export`). No TypeScript syntax in .js files.
- Async/await for all asynchronous code.
- Environment variables via dotenv. Never hardcode secrets.
- No CommonJS (`require`/`module.exports`).

## Key APIs

- X(Twitter): `twitter-api-v2` library
- Instagram: Graph API via `node-fetch` REST calls
- Firebase: `firebase-admin` for storage/auth

## Safety Rules (MUST preserve in all changes)

- Every SNS post must include bot disclosure footer: `(Generated by mystyleKPOP AI)`
- X posting rate limited to 5/hour, 30/day
- Instagram image URLs must be validated as publicly accessible before posting
- AI images use "Vibe-Alike" virtual models only, never 1:1 artist face replication
- All content labeled as AI-generated editorial/fan-art

## Structure

- `src/bot.js` - Core posting logic (`postToSNS` function)
- `scripts/test.js` - Integration tests
- `docs/` - Strategy documents
- `guidelines/` - Legal, IP, K-POP compliance guidelines
